member.name: IUnbufferedFileHandleOplockCallback.OnBrokenCallback
member.summary: Runs when the opportunistic lock for a handle that you get by calling the method is broken.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUnbufferedFileHandleOplockCallback
member.summary: Defines a callback method that you want to run when the opportunistic lock for a handle that you get by calling the method is broken.
